directions: Combine the kosher salt, coriander, cumin,  chili powder, paprika, allspice,  and black pepper in a bowl and mix thoroughly. Store in an airtight container at room temperature until ready to use.
To use, rub 1 tablespoon per serving onto the meat of your choice before grilling or cooking as desired.
title: Cumin-Coriander Pork Rub
